items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any user, all team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Data synchronization latency must be under 2 seconds.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to discuss tasks and projects.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within project-specific chat rooms.
Chat history is stored and retrievable for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Chat messages must be delivered with less than 1 second latency.
System must encrypt chat messages in transit and at rest.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core collaboration features include real-time task updates and integrated chat. Further clarification needed on additional features like file sharing, notifications, and role-based permissions.
